Home /

Product Designer as Architect

 Januar 09, 2024

Post Title

I have been discouraged for years by looking at the world class portfolios of design engineers.

But one doesn't have to be. Perhaps the architect carpenter analogy is more helpful here.

All architects must understand the materials they work with. But their responsibility and expertise lies elsewhere.

And some are hobby carpenters. But not all!
